description: This PHP source file handles WiFi spectrum analysis diagnostics, including fetching neighboring WiFi data, translating MAC addresses, rearranging signal data, and managing diagnostic states.

methods.name: mac_translate
methods.description: Converts a MAC address string to uppercase and formats it with colons if necessary.

methods.name: rearrange_SDTR
methods.description: Rearranges a comma-separated signal data string by inserting '-;' after the third element.

methods.name: get_results
methods.description: Retrieves WiFi neighbor diagnostic results, formats BSSID MAC addresses, and returns the diagnostic data or progress status.
